name: Pakistan
startIntroPart2: Gandhis worst nightmare. Or probably his best dream if you think about it, since now he can rain nuclear hellfire on India's arch-nemisis now!
declaringWar: Our armed forces are the servants of the people, and the people beg for war.
attacked: Failure is a word unknown to me.
defeated: I have lived as plain Mr. Jinnah and I will die as plain Mr. Jinnah.
introduction: I welcome you to the Republic of Pakistan, I sincerely hope that our relationship will be friendly and cordial.
hateNo: Do you think we are stupid?
afterPeace: Think a hundred times before you take a decision, but once that decision is taken, stand by it as one man.
tradeRequest: I do not believe in taking the right decision, I take a decision and make it right. This decision will be no different for you.
